name: sinking ship (sergio17sa, Hugo Leonardo Florez)
description:
Sinking is a survival 2d game in third person when the player appear alone within a medieval boat, apparently the character was sleep and the rest crew was evacuate due to emergency in the ship. To save their life the player will have to repair breakdowns in the boat, this breakdowns are in all the ship and if are not repair the ship is going to sink. Every single repair represent one mission in the game, this mission is connceted with the sea level. The victory condition is defined by succesfull result of missions that not allow thate the level water increase to sinking the ship while the lose condition is defined by failure of mission results anr represent de maximun water level. The win representation will be a image where the player is over mainland

GDD: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1PLX_FISmMuiDqyFURlnrU2WhoBEmjKwN?usp=sha...

TRELLO: https://trello.com/b/YExL6bnp/tasks-group-12
